name: Seek Me
description:
This is a puzzle platformer where you use ricocheting bullets your limited teleportation ability to traverse 40+ levels.

I created this game 12 years ago, so there may be some issues with the later levels that were never play tested.  Feel free to message me if you find an issue.  I'll try to correct any issues.

PC version is available now. 

A Mac version will be uploaded soon.
